attributes.action: To not allow police to unlawfully stop car events or gatherings on private land
attributes.additional_details: Allow the police to work with us on against us! As car meets and gatherings are becoming harder and harder to do we need the police to help us not be against us, if we work together we can create safer events and less negativity between us car enthusiasts and the police
attributes.background: Avon and Somerset police are now trying to use the general public for push their own agenda! This is to end all car events, Instead of working with is they're working against us trying to shutdown meets and a variety of issues to 99 percent of us who are doing nothing unlawful but enjoying cars.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You could raise the issue with the local Police and Crime Commissioner:

https://www.avonandsomerset-pcc.gov.uk/

You can find out how to make a complaint about policing here:

https://www.policeconduct.gov.uk/complaints-reviews-and-appeals/make-complaint
